title: ZORK I: The Great Underground Empire
winMessage:
*** CONGRATULATIONS! ***
You have recovered all the treasures and successfully completed the quest. You are a master adventurer!

west_of_house.name: West of House
west_of_house.description:
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
There is a small mailbox here.

north_of_house.name: North of House
north_of_house.description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

south_of_house.name: South of House
south_of_house.description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

east_of_house.name: Behind House
east_of_house.description: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

attic.name: Attic
attic.description: This is the attic. It is a dark and dusty place.

living_room.name: Living Room
living_room.description: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, and a trophy case to the north.

cellar.name: Cellar
cellar.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passage leading north. To the west, a narrow twisting passageway vanishes into the gloom.

troll_room.name: The Troll Room
troll_room.description: This is a small room with passages to the east and west, and a circular stairway leading up. A nasty-looking troll, brandishing a bloody axe, blocks all passages out of the room.

east_west_passage.name: East-West Passage
east_west_passage.description: This is a narrow east-west passage. There is a narrow stairway leading down.

round_room.name: Round Room
round_room.description: This is a round room, with circular walls. There are passages in all directions.

loud_room.name: Loud Room
loud_room.description: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a path heading to the north, and a passage to the south. The sound of running water is loud here.

dam.name: Dam
dam.description: You are standing on the top of the FCD#3 Dam, which was constructed in 959 GUE. The top of the dam is paved with smooth stone. There is a control panel here, which is protected from the weather by a metal covering.

mailbox.name: small mailbox
mailbox.description: It's a small, standard-issue mailbox. It looks like it could be opened.

leaflet.name: leaflet
leaflet.description:
WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be without one!

boarded_door.name: boarded front door
boarded_door.description: The door is boarded and you can't open it.

kitchen_window.name: small window
kitchen_window.description: The window is slightly ajar. You could probably climb through it.

sack.name: lunch sack
sack.description: It's a brown paper sack, smelling of hot peppers.

water.name: bottle of water
water.description: A bottle of clear, refreshing water.

sword.name: elvish sword
sword.description: A sword of ancient and beautiful workmanship.

rug.name: large rug
rug.description: It's a large, ornate rug. Moving it reveals a trap door.

trap_door.name: trap door
trap_door.description: A trap door is here. It is closed.

nailed_door.name: nailed door
nailed_door.description: The door has been nailed shut.

troll.name: nasty troll
troll.description: The troll is a fearsome creature. It is clutching a bloody axe.

quest_completed_plaque.name: Quest Completed Plaque
quest_completed_plaque.description: A plaque signifying the completion of your quest. You are a master adventurer!
